0.text: Innate: Soraka gains  70% bonus movement speed while facing nearby allied  champions that are below 40% of their maximum health.
0.html: Innate: Soraka gains  70% bonus movement speed while facing nearby allied champions that are below 40% of their maximum health.
markedPassages: 70% bonus movement speed
champions

0.text: Active: Soraka calls down a star upon the target location that grants  sight of the area before landing after 0.25 − 1 (based on target range) seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by 30% for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Soraka calls down a star upon the target location that grants sight of the area before landing after 0.25 − 1 (based on target range) seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 30% for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: sight
slowing

1.text: If this hits at least one enemy  champion, the star dust returns to Soraka to grant her Rejuvenation for 2.5 seconds. While Soraka has Rejuvenation,  Astral Infusion will also grant the effects of Rejuvenation to the target ally for the same duration.
1.html: If this hits at least one enemy champion, the star dust returns to Soraka to grant her Rejuvenation for 2.5 seconds. While Soraka has Rejuvenation, Astral Infusion will also grant the effects of Rejuvenation to the target ally for the same duration.
markedPassages: champion
Astral Infusion

2.text: Rejuvenation: The target  heals every 0.5 seconds and gains  bonus movement speed that decays over the duration.
2.html: Rejuvenation: The target heals every 0.5 seconds and gains  bonus movement speed that decays over the duration.
markedPassages: heals
bonus movement speed

0.text: Active: Soraka  heals the target allied champion.
0.html: Active: Soraka heals the target allied champion.
markedPassages: heals

1.text: If cast while under  Rejuvenation, the health cost will be reduced by a percentage.
1.html: If cast while under Rejuvenation, the health cost will be reduced by a percentage.
markedPassages: Rejuvenation

2.text: Astral Infusion cannot be cast if Soraka is  below 5% of her maximum health.
2.html: Astral Infusion cannot be cast if Soraka is  below 5% of her maximum health.
markedPassages: below 5% of her maximum health
below 5% of her maximum health

0.text: Active: Soraka creates a celestial zone at the target location that deals magic damage to enemy champions within at the time of cast. The zone then persists for 1.5 seconds and  silences enemies within.
0.html: Active: Soraka creates a celestial zone at the target location that deals magic damage to enemy champions within at the time of cast. The zone then persists for 1.5 seconds and silences enemies within.
markedPassages: silences

1.text: Afterwards, the zone erupts to deal the same damage to enemy champions within and  root them for a duration.
1.html: Afterwards, the zone erupts to deal the same damage to enemy champions within and root them for a duration.
markedPassages: root

0.text: Active: Soraka calls upon the stars,  healing herself and all allied champions, increased by 50% on targets below 40% of their maximum health.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8 ability power
+10 health
+50% base mana regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Tribute: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging basic attacks and abilities against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Frostfang, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRIBUTE: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging basic attacks and abilities against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants  20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

Consume

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 ability power
+20 ability haste
+200 health
+100% base mana regeneration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with attacks or abilities in combat, heal the nearby allied champion (excluding yourself) with the most missing health for 60 (2 second cooldown).
Each second spent in combat with champions grants 5% heal and shield power, stacking up to 4 times for maximum of 20%.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 8 increased heal for Starlit Grace.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – STARLIT GRACE: When affecting champions with attacks or abilities in combat,  heal the nearby allied champion (excluding yourself) with the most missing health for 60 (2 second cooldown).
Each second spent in combat with champions grants 5% heal and shield power, stacking up to 4 times for maximum of 20%.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability haste
+200 health
+100% base mana regeneration
+16% heal and shield power

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Intervention: Call upon a beam of light to strike upon the target location after 2.5 seconds, granting sight of the area for the duration. Allies within the area are healed for 180 − 340 (based on target's level), while enemy champions within take 10% of target's maximum health as true damage. Can be used while dead. (90 second cooldown; 5500 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – INTERVENTION: Call upon a beam of light to strike upon the target location after 2.5 seconds, granting  sight of the area for the duration. Allies within the area are  healed for 180 − 340 (based on target's level), while enemy champions within take 10% of target's maximum health as true damage. Can be used while dead. (90 second cooldown; 5500 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Grants Warmog's Heart if you have at least 1100 bonus health.
Unique – Warmog's Heart: Regenerate「 2.5% maximum health every 0.5 seconds 」「 25% maximum health every 5 seconds 」 if damage has not been taken in the last 6 seconds (3 seconds for damage from non-champions).

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Purify: Remove all crowd control debuffs (except Airborne, Blind, Disarm, Ground, Nearsight, and Suppression) from yourself or the target allied champion and heal the target for 100 − 180 (based on target's level) (120 second cooldown; 650 range).
